name: general, these
description:
The game, inspired by films like The Golden Compass and Out Of Africa, sees the player driving a office PC...and watching bad people do it.
Summarising the premise, the video says: "If you want to see what people really look like, you should be watching them in virtual reality. "For the past year or so, lots of great VR projects have been around, adaptation of films, classic games and entertainment. "The game starts life as a very basic Office PC, and must navigate a set of simulated office buildings, drives a truck, and is attacked by strange creatures. "The game is basically like a movie: you have to film your way through a city of crazy people, and you have to do it on the cheap. "We really wanted to make a VR game that was related to movies, and we also wanted to make a game that had some great graphics, but also has a well-rounded gameplay." The pair's previous project, The Plague, was similarly a cut-scene-driven movie.
